entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
